title: What were the Mutua Madrid Open results?

excerpt: The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open continued on Friday, when top seed Alexander Zverev began his campaign. Casper Ruud, Taylor Fritz and Ben Shelton were among those who advanced.

Madrid

Draper, Tsitsipas, Paul advance, Djokovic loses on Saturday

April 26, 2025

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

The Mutua Madrid Open is the fourth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open continued on Saturday, when Matteo Arnaldi shocked fourth seed Novak Djokovic. Stefanos Tsitsipas, Alex de Minaur, Jack Draper and Tommy Paul were among those who advanced.

View all the Madrid results from Saturday below.

ATP - [6] Alex de Minaur (AUS) d Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) 62 63
ATP - Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) d [4] Novak Djokovic (SRB) 63 64
ATP - [11] Tommy Paul (USA) d Joao Fonseca (BRA) 76(7) 76(3)
ATP - [10] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) 76(3) 62
ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) d Tallon Griekspoor (NED) 63 64
ATP - [17] Stefanos Tsitsipas (GRE) d Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) 36 64 63
ATP - [15] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) d Nicolas Jarry (CHI) 63 64
ATP - [16] Frances Tiafoe (USA) d Luciano Darderi (ITA) 75 31 Retired
